pullrequest.title: Make libignition-msgs-dev to Depend on protobuf-compiler and protoc

content.raw:
The error on ign-sensors came from including `#include <ignition/msgs.hh>` in a file which didn't even use it though:

~~~
In file included from /usr/include/ignition/msgs1/ignition/msgs.hh:24:0,
                 from /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/ignition_sensors-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64/ign-sensors/include/ignition/sensors/CameraConfig.hh:24,
                 from /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/ignition_sensors-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64/ign-sensors/src/CameraConfig.cc:18:
/usr/include/ignition/msgs1/ignition/msgs/Generator.hh:20:53: fatal error: google/protobuf/compiler/code_generator.h: No such file or directory
~~~

See [include/ignition/sensors/CameraConfig.hh](https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-sensors/src/6d77a539caae2801fe4df057a9240da73eb99563/include/ignition/sensors/CameraConfig.hh?fileviewer=file-view-default#CameraConfig.hh-24).

As far as I can tell, `ign-sensors` is only using standard ign-msgs messages (`ignition::msgs::Image`)
content.html:
The error on ign-sensors came from including #include <ignition/msgs.hh> in a file which didn't even use it though:

In file included from /usr/include/ignition/msgs1/ignition/msgs.hh:24:0,
                 from /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/ignition_sensors-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64/ign-sensors/include/ignition/sensors/CameraConfig.hh:24,
                 from /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/ignition_sensors-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64/ign-sensors/src/CameraConfig.cc:18:
/usr/include/ignition/msgs1/ignition/msgs/Generator.hh:20:53: fatal error: google/protobuf/compiler/code_generator.h: No such file or directory

See include/ignition/sensors/CameraConfig.hh.

As far as I can tell, ign-sensors is only using standard ign-msgs messages (ignition::msgs::Image)
